reviews.text: Bottle, 33cL. Home. A shining pitch black beer with a big beige foamy head with a great retention. Roast, red berries, leather, light herb, black chocolate, light wood. Light sweet, light to medium dry bitter refreshing, light acid. Medium body, silky texture, good carbonation, dry fruity bitter roasty acid lasting finish. Overall, truely delicious !!
